title: Gingerbread bear biscuits
ingredients: ['225g unsalted butter', '150g dark brown soft sugar', '225g golden syrup', '1 egg, beaten', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '500g plain flour', '3/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '3/4 teaspoon ground cloves']
